name: EastUnBloc: Last Night a DJ Saved My Life
description: EastUnBloc creates a space of empowerment and resistance featuring Ljubljana artist Marina Gržinić alongside Bass Resistance, a Berlin-based Ukrainian DJ collective formed in opposition to war and oppression. The event examines club culture and electronic music as sites of collective resistance, community-building, and celebration, tracing how movements have been forged on dancefloors. A rare convergence of critical artistic practice and dance music politics.
